featured.text: The parrot was (21) , there was no other bird like him in the whole world.
But the parrot would not say it.
He picked up the parrot and threw the bird into the chicken house.
The parrot was screaming at the fourth, “Say ‘Catano’ or I’ll kill you!” 21.
The man (23) everything he could to teach the parrot to say “Catano,” but he never (24) .

definition.zh_def: 鸚鵡，一種色彩鮮豔的鳥類，能模仿人類的語言和聲音。
definition.en_def: A parrot is a colorful bird known for its ability to mimic human speech and sounds.
definition.example: The parrot repeated everything it heard from its owner.
